attributes.action: prioritise more public funds to Social Workers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Social Work offices have so many vacancies as they cannot find good social workers or thier budgets cannot stretch far enough, that vital work is not being done.
We will not prevent another Baby P situation unless there is a more even spread of public funds to ensure we can finance the job we need to do.
